    getAdjacent() - Method in class train.Element
    Returns an array that contains the adjacent elements (sections or railways)
    getCurrentDirection() - Method in class train.SubRailway
    Return the current direction of a subrailway.
    getDirection() - Method in class train.Position
    Returns the direction of the train
    getElement(int) - Method in class train.Railway
    Returns an element of the railway corresponding to the index given.
    getElements() - Method in class train.SubRailway
    Return the list of elements of a subrailway.
    getIndex(Element) - Method in class train.Railway
    Return the index (order) of an element in a railway.
    getIsOccupied() - Method in class train.Element
    Returns whether the element is occupied of not
    getMessage() - Method in exception class train.BadPositionForTrainException
     
    getPos() - Method in class train.Position
    Returns the element where the train is positioned
    getPosition() - Method in class train.Train
    Returns the position of the train
    getRailway() - Method in class train.Element
    Returns the railway that the element belongs to
    getSize() - Method in class train.Railway
    Returns the length of the railway (via counting the elements that compose it)
    getStations() - Method in class train.Railway
    Return the list of stations of a railway.
    getSubRailway(Element) - Method in class train.Railway
    Returns the subrailway that an element belongs to, else throws an IllegalStateException if it doesn't exist in the railway or in any subrailway
    getSubRailways() - Method in class train.Railway
    Return the list of subrailways of a railway.
